category.name: FMS
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_VOLUME_MONITOR_WARNING_LEVEL
preference.preference_description: Specifies the percentage full a volume must reach to achieve warning level. When a volume's capacity reaches warning level, its volume data is colored yellow in the Volume Monitor view of the Volume Management perspective. Additionally, such volumes display when filtering the table tree to list only volumes with a severity of Warning. Valid Values: Accepts a single value between 1 and 99, inclusive. The value must be less than the value set for the TC_VOLUME_MONITOR_CRITICAL_LEVEL preference.
